hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the fastest way forward is walking backwards.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: Having trouble defeating Dark Link?^Look away from him while holding Z-Target and then when Dark Link walks up behind you, strafe sideways and slash your sword.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #1# major item.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Arrows (5 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's River#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Deku Stick#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #1# major item.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Deku Stick#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of #the hero#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #a Green Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Morpha#.
